message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's a great deal for a product worth $15,000 to me, and I think it's a fair price considering your value of $12,000.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $13,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
